data.name: Vanilla Cherry Chip
data.description: Classic cake donut that gives you the crunch outside and soft cake inside.  Dunked in a vanilla glaze and topped with a vanilla icing drizzle.

data.name: Apple Fritter
data.description: Crisp apples, cinnamon and classic yeast risen dough.

data.name: OG Sprinkle
data.description: Vanilla glaze and colourful sprinkles.  Another timeless classic.

data.name: Boston Cream
data.description: Fluffy bismark, filled with custard and topped with a chocolate ganache.

data.name: Cinnamon Bun Donut
data.description: Cinnamon and vanilla glaze over swirled cinnamon dough.

data.name: Old Fashion Chocolate Cake
data.description: Classic chocolate cake donut with a vanilla glaze.

data.name: Cinnamon Twist
data.description: Cinnamon dough twisted like a braid and topped with a vanilla cinnamon glaze.

data.name: Dutchie
data.description: Fresh dough with raisins scattered throughout.a serious classic donut. Definitely delicious!

data.name: Tequila Lime
data.description: Transporting you to another place with this one! Even if you can’t leave your house, at least we can dream!

data.name: Double Espresso
data.description: Our house glaze infused with fresh ground 49th Parallel espresso. Our coffee shop might not be open but this is really all you need!

data.name: Hibiscus Almond
data.description: Steeped loose leaf hibiscus tea, our house glaze glaze and toasted almonds! We know you want one! The bright fresh natural colour makes this one a really really good choice.

data.name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
data.description: Our yeast risen donut dipped in chocolate ganache, topped with fudge brownies, walnuts and caramel.

data.name: Vanilla Passionfruit
data.description: Fresh and delicious. It’s Tropical getaway and you get to eat it.

data.name: Lemon Blueberry Bar
data.description: Lemon cream filled long john with a limoncello glaze & blueberry. If ya love lemon, you’ll love this!

data.name: Peanut Butter Bliss
data.description: Our PB fans where ya at??  This is definitely for you. PB glaze, chopped roasted peanuts, dark chocolate drizzle. OMGosh! So so yummy!

data.name: Blue Raspberry Lemonade
data.description: Because you can’t hit up the snow cone truck, we got you! This is one of our all time classics and we’ve brought it this week.

data.name: Churros
data.description: Cinnamon glaze topped with churro cereal pieces and a vanilla drizzle.

data.name: Black Forest
data.description: Black Forest cake transformed into a donut. Chocolate ganache, cherry cream filling, buttercream, chocolate shavings.

data.name: S'mores
data.description: Chocolate ganache, custard filled, toasted marshmallow fluff, graham crackers! Campfire season is just around the corner but we’re getting the jump on it now!

data.name: Peanut Butter Whiskey Milkshake
data.description: A special flavour request that we LOVED so we made it for the week! Rich peanut butter glaze infused with whisky essence and topped with chocolate buttercream, chocolate drizzle, peanuts and chocolate chips!

data.name: Key Lime Pie
data.description: One of our very first flavours we made when we opened last year! This is to die for! Natural key lime infused glaze, fresh lime zest and graham crackers. So delicious!

data.name: Red Velvet Cheesecake
data.description: Super rich cream cheese glaze topped with red velvet cheesecake crumble and cream cheese drizzle. OMG!

data.name: Toasted Coconut Cream
data.description: Our classic Bismarck donut filled with coconut cream, topped with a coconut infused glaze and toasted coconut! Tropical getaway right here!

data.name: Vietnamese Coffee
data.description: Light and fluffy yeast risen donut topped with our signature 49th Parallel espresso glaze topped with condensed milk drizzle. Heaven!

data.name: Lavender + Honey
data.description: The perfect combination! Lavender infused glaze, honey drizzle and honeycomb toffee. Yum!

data.name: Fruity Pebbles
data.description: Our house vanilla glaze infused with natural fruit flavours and topped with fruity pebbles to give it nice crunch. A super fun and tasty creation!

data.name: Mint Chip Brownie
data.description: Our rich mint chocolate ganache topped melt in your mouth fudge brownie and a vanilla mint drizzle. OMG…You gotta try this!

data.name: The Fat “Elvis”
data.description: Named after Elvis Presley himself – his fave combo is on our donuts! Our light and fluffy yeast risen donut smothered in house made maple glaze and topped with fresh banana, bacon crumble and peanut butter drizzle. Obvi Elvis knows best!

data.name: Lemon Sherbet
data.description: Our house glaze infused with naturallemon flavour and a touch of lemon buttercream. Tart and tangy on top of our soft yeast risen donut.

data.name: Summer Berry Cheesecake
data.description: Our classic Bismarck donut filled with a mix of Summer Berries and topped with a rich cream cheese glaze and graham crackers. Delicious!

data.name: Caramel Green Apple
data.description: One of our very first flavours we made when we opened last year! This is to die for! Natural key lime infused glaze, lime zest and graham crackers. So delicious!

data.name: Almond Mocha Mudslide
data.description: Our house made glaze infused with Detour dark roast coffee topped with toasted almonds, oreo crumb, and milk chocolate drizzle. Heaven heaven heaven! 12/10

data.name: Sharkleberry
data.description: One of our first ever flavours! Classic Sharkleberry. A blend of strawberry, orange, banana. Childhood memories! So good!

data.name: Butterfly Pea Flower
data.description: This Southeast Asia flower is delightful. A fruity and floral flavour when added to culinary dishes. Garnished with a few little edible blue flowers. Yum!
